name: The Mine Below
description:
The Mine Below

A game about being a person in a mine killing slimes in a limited amount of time.

Note: This game is not finished. It will likely receive some updates in the near future.

Current Version: V0.0.1 (Early Prototype)

Controls: Arrow Keys for movement, any of A/S/Z/X for shooting. (Can be changed by pressing escape, typing in keymap, then returning to the game by typing run)

This is a game created for onehourgamejam #1hgj Nr. 117  (Theme: "The World Below") on 22th July 2017.

This game was made in TIC-80.

The Mine Below by nickifr is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.
